Package loadero.main

Interface LoaderoCommonOperation<T extends LoaderoModel>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Concrete type of the LoaderModel interface.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLoaderoService
    public interface LoaderoCommonOperation<T extends LoaderoModel>
    Public interface for specifying common operation for Loadero service layer such as GET request and method for building urls.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String buildUrl​(int... ids)
      Common method used by every service to build url for itself.
      T getById​(int... ids)
      Make GET request to the endpoint and retrieves object/objects with specific ID.

    • Method Detail

      • getById

        T getById​(int... ids)
        Make GET request to the endpoint and retrieves object/objects with specific ID.
        Parameters:
        ids - Array of IDs.
        Returns:
        Returns concrete object of the LoaderoModel type from Loadero.
        Throws:
        loadero.exceptions.LoaderoException - if any of ids are negative.

      • buildUrl

        String buildUrl​(int... ids)
        Common method used by every service to build url for itself.
        Parameters:
        ids - ID of the specific object endpoint.
        Returns:
        URL pointing to the object.
